name: Game, Toy, and Hobby Shops
tcc: R for face-to-face transactions.\nT for nonâ€“face-to-face transactions.
description:
Merchants that sell toys and games, and may sell a limited selection
of do-it-yourself craft or hobby kits.
For merchants that primarily sell supplies, materials, and equipment
used to assemble crafts, use MCC 5970.
